headline: Show HN: DealHeroGames – Deals on top Steam games
description:
As a longtime PC gamer with decreasing free time, I've been wanting a simple site to keep tabs on the biggest games right now (for my preferred distribution service Steam), but also find out where I can save on keys safely (official stores only).

Combining these thoughts with my goal of refreshing my tech skills (React/Next.js/Symfony), here's what I've come up with.

Hacker News, I'd like to hear what you think!
